TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaKeyref extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaIdentityConstraint

summary.span: 此類別會將來自 XML 結構描述的 元素，依全球資訊網協會 (W3C) 的規定表示。

span.span: This class represents the element from XMLSchema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定屬性或項目值 （或一組值） 是否有與指定的對應關係`key`或`unique`項目。Specifies that an attribute or element value (or set of values) has a correspondence with those of the specified `key` or `unique` element. 條件約束名稱必須是唯一的結構描述內。The constraint name must be unique within a schema. ## Examples 下列範例會建立`key`項目。The following example creates a `key` element. [!code-cpp[Classic Webdata XmlSchemaKeyRef Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaKeyRef Example/CPP/key_sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Webdata XmlSchemaKeyRef Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaKeyRef Example/CS/key_sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Webdata XmlSchemaKeyRef Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaKeyRef Example/VB/key_sample.vb#1)] 上述程式碼範例，會產生下列 XML 檔案。The following XML file is generated for the preceding code example. [!code-xml[Classic Webdata XmlSchemaKeyRef Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaKeyRef Example/XML/key_sample.xsd#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::XmlQualifiedName ^ Refer { System::Xml::XmlQualifiedName ^ get(); void set(System::Xml::XmlQualifiedName ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個條件約束所參考的其他簡單或複雜類型中的索引鍵之名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the key that this constraint refers to in another simple or complex type.

value.span: 這個條件約束參考的索引鍵之 QName。

span.span: The QName of the key that this constraint refers to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名稱`key`或`unique`這個結構描述 （或另一個指定的命名空間指示的結構描述） 中定義的項目。Name of a `key` or `unique` element defined in this schema (or another schema indicated by the specified namespace). `Refer`值必須是 QName。The `Refer` value must be a QName. `Refer`值可以包含命名空間前置詞。The `Refer` value can include a namespace prefix.
